column4: Is anyone else having mayor issues installing software on a hardy 64 bits system?  I get lots of bzip2 errors when updating. I've cleared the /var/cache/apt dir and also tried with aptitude. I've tried many combinations of sources list lines but it seems the update system is completely corrupt
can you use pastebin to provide the output of: sudo apt-get clean; sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get upgrade
you could manually download the file and put it where it goes, the server is up
